snippet: The Devils’ forechecking, which had been resoundingly successful in the playoffs, was lackluster against the Kings in Game 1.
lead_paragraph: The Devils’ forechecking, which had been resoundingly successful in the playoffs, was lackluster against the Kings in Game 1.

headline.seo: Stanley Cup Finals — Devils Looking to Restart Their Offense
headline.main: Devils Looking to Restart Their Offense in Game 2
